title: Five Horses Tavern
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, American, Pizza, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Bar and American comfort food restaurant in Davis Square. Vegan could get the white bean hummus starter, bomb-mi (Vietnamese sandwich), a veggie burger patty (specify vegan), tofu curry, the grazing plate, and pizza in vegan version. Note the potato taco are fried in same oil as meat.
